title: What Learning Systems do Intelligent Agents Need? Complementary Learning Systems Theory Updated

tldr.text: This work updates complementary learning systems (CLS) theory and extends it by showing that recurrent activation of hippocampal traces can support some forms of generalization and that neocortical learning can be rapid for information that is consistent with known structure.
